historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 35-2112.

Miscellaneous Notes

Expiration of Temporary Motor Vehicle Insurance Review Commission: Pursuant to subsection (i) of former § 35-2112 [1981 Ed.], the Temporary Motor Vehicle Insurance Review Commission was to expire 3 years after March 4, 1986. The Temporary Motor Vehicle Insurance Review Commission is deemed to have expired on March 4, 1989.

DC CODE § 31-2412

Current through December 11, 2012

subtitle.text: Fire, Casualty, Marine, Motor Vehicle and Related Insurance.

heading.catch_text: Temporary Motor Vehicle Insurance Review Commission.   [Expired]
